



	*********************  Welcome to SCAMP!  **********************

	ULTRIX System Configuration And Management Program  (SCAMP) is a
	menu-driven program that helps you set up and manage your system
	quickly and easily.  With  SCAMP  you  can  add  or  remove user
	accounts and software;  set up terminals,  printers, and modems;
	and shut down and reboot your system.

	To use SCAMP,  select the appropriate setup or management option
	from the  Main Menu  and then  answer the questions displayed on
	the screen.
